name: Spooky-Spooki No-No
description:
This is my submission for the Ghost Jam Game Jam.

Take up the role of a ghost named, Spooky-Spooki, and scare away the occupants of your domain. Possess chairs and photographs to help further along the eviction.

Features:

*Original sprite work

*Original chiptunes

(Would of loved to make it longer, but due to the time restrictions this is all I have done.)
